extendedIngredients.name: french bread
extendedIngredients.originalString: 1 16-ounce French-bread baguette, halved lengthwise, halves cut on diagonal into 4-inch-long pieces, lightly toasted

title: Toasted Baguette with Tomatoes and Anchovies
instructions: Preparation                                                        Using coarse grater held over medium bowl, grate tomatoes down to skin. Discard skin. Add 1/3 cup olive oil and garlic to grated tomatoes. Season mixture to taste with salt and pepper. (Tomatoes can be prepared 2 hours ahead. Let stand at room temperature.)                                                                Place toast pieces on platter. Drizzle with additional oil. Place anchovies in small bowl. Serve toast, passing tomatoes and anchovies alongside.

steps.step: Using coarse grater held over medium bowl, grate tomatoes down to skin. Discard skin.
Add 1/3 cup olive oil and garlic to grated tomatoes. Season mixture to taste with salt and pepper. (Tomatoes can be prepared 2 hours ahead.
Serve toast, passing tomatoes and anchovies alongside.
